title: Video path disallowed the special character and space
body:
**Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version**

Ubuntu 16.04 server, DeepLabCut 2.0.6.2 Python 3.6
 
**Describe the bug**

As the title described, if the video path contains whitespace or special character (e.g. [ ] )
In my case, the video name from the third party may contain the whitespace.

```
Traceback (most recent call last):                                                                                                                                                        
  File "/home/afun/.local/share/virtualenvs/buried-mouse-track-4ezhdAuL/lib/python3.6/site-packages/deeplabcut/generate_training_dataset/labeling_toolbox.py", line 438, in browseDir     
    self.img = self.index[self.iter]                                                                                                                                                      
IndexError: index 0 is out of bounds for axis 0 with size 0                                                                                                                               
Segmentation fault (core dumped)
```
https://github.com/AlexEMG/DeepLabCut/blob/master/deeplabcut/generate_training_dataset/labeling_toolbox.py#L438

However, it's a minor bug and it could be easily avoided if and only if the user changed the path name.
